targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  month(date) as time,
  sum(amount) as "Total Monthly Income"
FROM 
  corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry cw
join corptools_corporationwalletdivision cwd on cw.division_id = cwd.id
join corptools_corporationaudit caudit on cwd.corporation_id = caudit.id
join eveonline_evecorporationinfo cinfo on caudit.corporation_id = cinfo.id
where $__timeFilter(date)
  AND (cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp1
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp2
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp3
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp4)
  AND (ref_type != "player_donation" 
  AND ref_type != "corporation_account_withdrawal"
  AND amount > 0
  OR ref_type = "market_provider_tax")
GROUP BY year(date), month(date)
ORDER BY year(date) DESC, month(date) DESC

SELECT
  month(date) as time,
  sum(amount) / day(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) as "Average Per Day"
FROM 
  corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry cw
join corptools_corporationwalletdivision cwd on cw.division_id = cwd.id
join corptools_corporationaudit caudit on cwd.corporation_id = caudit.id
join eveonline_evecorporationinfo cinfo on caudit.corporation_id = cinfo.id
where $__timeFilter(date)
  AND (cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp1
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp2
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp3
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp4)
  AND (ref_type = "planetary_export_tax" 
  OR ref_type = "planetary_import_tax"
  OR ref_type = "reprocessing_tax"
  OR ref_type = "industry_job_tax"
  OR ref_type = "brokers_fee"
  OR ref_type = "ess_escrow_transfer"
  OR ref_type = "bounty_prizes"
  OR ref_type = "corporate_reward_payout"
  OR ref_type = "structure_gate_jump"
  OR ref_type = "jump_clone_installation_fee"
  OR ref_type = "market_provider_tax")
GROUP BY year(date), month(date)
ORDER BY year(date) DESC, month(date) DESC

SELECT
  month(date) as time,
  sum(amount) as "Total Monthly Income"
FROM 
  corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry cw
join corptools_corporationwalletdivision cwd on cw.division_id = cwd.id
join corptools_corporationaudit caudit on cwd.corporation_id = caudit.id
join eveonline_evecorporationinfo cinfo on caudit.corporation_id = cinfo.id
where $__timeFilter(date)
  AND (cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp1
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp2
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp3
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp4)
  AND (ref_type != "player_donation" 
  AND ref_type != "corporation_account_withdrawal"
  AND ref_type != "market_provider_tax"
  AND amount < 0)
GROUP BY year(date), month(date)
ORDER BY year(date) DESC, month(date) DESC

SELECT
  month(date) as time,
  IF(ISNULL(sum(amount))=1, 0, sum(amount)) / day(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) as "Avg. Daily Maint. Cost"
FROM 
  corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry cw
join corptools_corporationwalletdivision cwd on cw.division_id = cwd.id
join corptools_corporationaudit caudit on cwd.corporation_id = caudit.id
join eveonline_evecorporationinfo cinfo on caudit.corporation_id = cinfo.id
where $__timeFilter(date)
  AND (cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp1
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp2
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp3
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp4)
  AND (ref_type != "player_donation" 
  AND ref_type != "corporation_account_withdrawal"
  AND ref_type != "market_provider_tax"
  AND amount < 0)
GROUP BY year(date), month(date)
ORDER BY year(date) DESC, month(date) DESC

SELECT
  month(date) as time,

select
    cw.balance, 
    cw.date as time
from
    corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry cw
join corptools_corporationwalletdivision cwd on cw.division_id = cwd.id
join corptools_corporationaudit caudit on cwd.corporation_id = caudit.id
join eveonline_evecorporationinfo cinfo on caudit.corporation_id = cinfo.id
where cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp4 and cw.division_id = 1
order BY $__timeGroup(cw.date,'5m')

select
    cw.balance, 
    cw.date as time
from
    corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry cw
join corptools_corporationwalletdivision cwd on cw.division_id = cwd.id
join corptools_corporationaudit caudit on cwd.corporation_id = caudit.id
join eveonline_evecorporationinfo cinfo on caudit.corporation_id = cinfo.id
where cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp4 and cw.division_id = 6
order BY $__timeGroup(cw.date,'5m')

SELECT
  week(date) as time,
  sum(amount) as "Total Weekly Income"
FROM 
  corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry cw
join corptools_corporationwalletdivision cwd on cw.division_id = cwd.id
join corptools_corporationaudit caudit on cwd.corporation_id = caudit.id
join eveonline_evecorporationinfo cinfo on caudit.corporation_id = cinfo.id
where $__timeFilter(date)
  AND (cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp1
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp2
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp3
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp4)
  AND (ref_type = "planetary_export_tax" 
  OR ref_type = "planetary_import_tax"
  OR ref_type = "reprocessing_tax"
  OR ref_type = "industry_job_tax"
  OR ref_type = "brokers_fee"
  OR ref_type = "ess_escrow_transfer"
  OR ref_type = "bounty_prizes"
  OR ref_type = "corporate_reward_payout"
  OR ref_type = "structure_gate_jump"
  OR ref_type = "jump_clone_installation_fee"
  OR ref_type = "market_provider_tax")
GROUP BY year(date), week(date)
ORDER BY year(date) DESC, week(date) DESC

SELECT
  week(date) as time,
  IF(ISNULL(sum(amount))=1, 0, sum(amount)) as "Weekly Maint. Cost"
FROM 
  corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry cw
join corptools_corporationwalletdivision cwd on cw.division_id = cwd.id
join corptools_corporationaudit caudit on cwd.corporation_id = caudit.id
join eveonline_evecorporationinfo cinfo on caudit.corporation_id = cinfo.id
where $__timeFilter(date)
  AND (cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp1
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp2
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp3
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp4)
  AND (ref_type = "infrastructure_hub_maintenance"
  OR ref_type = "alliance_maintainance_fee"
  OR ref_type = "office_rental_fee"
  OR ref_type = "advertisement_listing_fee")
GROUP BY year(date), week(date)
ORDER BY year(date) DESC, week(date) DESC

SELECT
  now() as time,
  ref_type,
  sum(amount) as "Total"
FROM 
  corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry cw
join corptools_corporationwalletdivision cwd on cw.division_id = cwd.id
join corptools_corporationaudit caudit on cwd.corporation_id = caudit.id
join eveonline_evecorporationinfo cinfo on caudit.corporation_id = cinfo.id
where $__timeFilter(date)
  AND (cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp1
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp2
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp3
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp4)
  AND (ref_type != "player_donation" 
  AND ref_type != "corporation_account_withdrawal"
  AND ref_type != "contract_price"
  AND amount > 0
  OR ref_type = "market_provider_tax")
GROUP BY year(date), month(date), ref_type
ORDER BY year(date) DESC, month(date) DESC

SELECT
  now() as time,
  ref_type,
  if(sum(amount) > 0, 0, sum(amount) * -1)  as "Total"
FROM 
  corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry cw
join corptools_corporationwalletdivision cwd on cw.division_id = cwd.id
join corptools_corporationaudit caudit on cwd.corporation_id = caudit.id
join eveonline_evecorporationinfo cinfo on caudit.corporation_id = cinfo.id
where $__timeFilter(date)
  AND (cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp1
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp2
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp3
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp4)
  AND (ref_type != "player_donation" 
  AND ref_type != "corporation_account_withdrawal"
  AND ref_type != "contract_price"
  AND ref_type != "market_provider_tax"
  AND amount < 0)
GROUP BY year(date), month(date), ref_type
ORDER BY year(date) DESC, month(date) DESC

select
    cw.balance, 
    cw.date as time
from
    corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry cw
join corptools_corporationwalletdivision cwd on cw.division_id = cwd.id
join corptools_corporationaudit caudit on cwd.corporation_id = caudit.id
join eveonline_evecorporationinfo cinfo on caudit.corporation_id = cinfo.id
where cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp4
order BY $__timeGroup(cw.date,'5m')

select
    cw.balance, 
    cw.date as time
from
    corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry cw
join corptools_corporationwalletdivision cwd on cw.division_id = 6
join corptools_corporationaudit caudit on cwd.corporation_id = caudit.id
join eveonline_evecorporationinfo cinfo on caudit.corporation_id = cinfo.id
where cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp4
order BY $__timeGroup(cw.date,'1m')

SELECT
  SUM(si.quantity / ((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(ss.fuel_expires_at) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP()) / 86400))*$FuelBlock,
  ss.fuel_expires_at as "time"
FROM structures_structureitem si
  INNER JOIN structures_structure ss ON si.structure_id = ss.id
WHERE si.location_flag = "StructureFuel"
  AND owner_id = 1
  AND si.eve_type_id != 16273
group by time

SELECT
  (SUM(si.quantity / ((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(ss.fuel_expires_at) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP()) / 86400))*$FuelBlock)*28,
  ss.fuel_expires_at as "time"
FROM structures_structureitem si
  INNER JOIN structures_structure ss ON si.structure_id = ss.id
WHERE si.location_flag = "StructureFuel"
  AND owner_id = 1
  AND si.eve_type_id != 16273
group by time

SELECT
  SUM(si.quantity / ((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(ss.fuel_expires_at) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP()) / 86400)),
  ss.fuel_expires_at as "time"
FROM structures_structureitem si
  INNER JOIN structures_structure ss ON si.structure_id = ss.id
WHERE si.location_flag = "StructureFuel"
  AND owner_id = 1
  AND si.eve_type_id != 16273
group by time

SELECT
  SUM(si.quantity / ((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(ss.fuel_expires_at) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP()) / 86400))*7,
  ss.fuel_expires_at as "time"
FROM structures_structureitem si
  INNER JOIN structures_structure ss ON si.structure_id = ss.id
WHERE si.location_flag = "StructureFuel"
  AND owner_id = 1
  AND si.eve_type_id != 16273
group by time

SELECT
  SUM(si.quantity / ((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(ss.fuel_expires_at) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP()) / 86400))*30,
  ss.fuel_expires_at as "time"
FROM structures_structureitem si
  INNER JOIN structures_structure ss ON si.structure_id = ss.id
WHERE si.location_flag = "StructureFuel"
  AND owner_id = 1
  AND si.eve_type_id != 16273
group by time

select
    cw.date, cw.amount, cw.description, cw.reason, cw.ref_type, cw.division_id, cw.balance
from
    corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry cw
join corptools_corporationwalletdivision cwd on cw.division_id = cwd.id
join corptools_corporationaudit caudit on cwd.corporation_id = caudit.id
join eveonline_evecorporationinfo cinfo on caudit.corporation_id = cinfo.id
where $__timeFilter(date) and cinfo.corporation_id = 98660859

SELECT
  month(date) as "Month",
  sum(amount) as "Total Monthly Ratting Income",
  (sum(amount)/0.05)*0.05 as "Total Monthly Tax Owed"
FROM 
  corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry cw
join corptools_corporationwalletdivision cwd on cw.division_id = cwd.id
join corptools_corporationaudit caudit on cwd.corporation_id = caudit.id
join eveonline_evecorporationinfo cinfo on caudit.corporation_id = cinfo.id
where cinfo.corporation_id = '98664079'
  AND $__timeFilter(date)
  AND (ref_type = "bounty_prizes"
  OR ref_type = "ess_escrow_transfer")
  AND year(date) = 2022
GROUP BY year(date), month(date), 1
ORDER BY year(date) DESC, month(date) DESC, 1

SELECT
  year(date) as "Year",
  month(date) as "Month",
  sum(amount) as "Total Monthly Income Before Sov",
  (sum(amount) - LAG (sum(amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(date) asc, month(date) asc)) AS "Amount Difference From Previous",
  (sum(amount) - LAG (sum(amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(date) asc, month(date) asc))/ LAG (sum(amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(date) asc, month(date) ASC) * 100 AS "% Difference From Previous"
FROM 
  corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry cw
join corptools_corporationwalletdivision cwd on cw.division_id = cwd.id
join corptools_corporationaudit caudit on cwd.corporation_id = caudit.id
join eveonline_evecorporationinfo cinfo on caudit.corporation_id = cinfo.id
where $__timeFilter(date)
  AND (cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp1
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp2
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp3
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp4)
  AND (ref_type != "player_donation" 
  AND ref_type != "corporation_account_withdrawal"
  AND amount > 0
  OR ref_type = "market_provider_tax")
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1 DESC, 2 DESC

SELECT
  year(date) as "Year",
  month(date) as "Month",
  sum(amount) as "Total Monthly Income After Sov",
  (sum(amount) - LAG (sum(amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(date) asc, month(date) asc)) AS "Amount Difference From Previous",
  (sum(amount) - LAG (sum(amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(date) asc, month(date) asc))/ LAG (sum(amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(date) asc, month(date) ASC) * 100 AS "% Difference From Previous"
FROM 
  corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry cw
join corptools_corporationwalletdivision cwd on cw.division_id = cwd.id
join corptools_corporationaudit caudit on cwd.corporation_id = caudit.id
join eveonline_evecorporationinfo cinfo on caudit.corporation_id = cinfo.id
where $__timeFilter(date)
  AND (cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp1
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp2
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp3
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp4)
  AND (ref_type = "planetary_export_tax" 
  OR ref_type = "planetary_import_tax"
  OR ref_type = "reprocessing_tax"
  OR ref_type = "industry_job_tax"
  OR ref_type = "brokers_fee"
  OR ref_type = "ess_escrow_transfer"
  OR ref_type = "bounty_prizes"
  OR ref_type = "corporate_reward_payout"
  OR ref_type = "structure_gate_jump"
  OR ref_type = "jump_clone_installation_fee"
  OR ref_type = "market_provider_tax"
  OR ref_type = "infrastructure_hub_maintenance")
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1 DESC, 2 DESC

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(date,'1d') as time_sec,
  sum(amount) as "Daily Income"
FROM 
  corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry cw
join corptools_corporationwalletdivision cwd on cw.division_id = cwd.id
join corptools_corporationaudit caudit on cwd.corporation_id = caudit.id
join eveonline_evecorporationinfo cinfo on caudit.corporation_id = cinfo.id
where $__timeFilter(date) 
  AND (cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp1
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp2
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp3
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp4)
  AND (ref_type = "planetary_export_tax" 
  OR ref_type = "planetary_import_tax"
  OR ref_type = "reprocessing_tax"
  OR ref_type = "industry_job_tax"
  OR ref_type = "brokers_fee"
  OR ref_type = "ess_escrow_transfer"
  OR ref_type = "bounty_prizes"
  OR ref_type = "corporate_reward_payout"
  OR ref_type = "structure_gate_jump"
  OR ref_type = "jump_clone_installation_fee"
  OR ref_type = "market_provider_tax")
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
  year(date) as "Year",
  month(date) as "Month",
  sum(amount) * -1 as "Total Monthly Maintenance Cost",
  (sum(amount) - LAG (sum(amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(date) asc, month(date) asc)) AS "Amount Difference From Previous",
  (sum(amount) - LAG (sum(amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(date) asc, month(date) asc))/ LAG (sum(amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(date) asc, month(date) ASC) * 100 AS "% Difference From Previous"
FROM corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry cw
join corptools_corporationwalletdivision cwd on cw.division_id = cwd.id
join corptools_corporationaudit caudit on cwd.corporation_id = caudit.id
join eveonline_evecorporationinfo cinfo on caudit.corporation_id = cinfo.id
where $__timeFilter(date)
  AND (cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp1
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp2
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp3
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp4)
  AND ref_type = "infrastructure_hub_maintenance"
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1 DESC, 2 DESC

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(date,'24h') as time_sec,
  sum(amount),
  ref_type as metric
FROM 
  corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry cw
join corptools_corporationwalletdivision cwd on cw.division_id = cwd.id
join corptools_corporationaudit caudit on cwd.corporation_id = caudit.id
join eveonline_evecorporationinfo cinfo on caudit.corporation_id = cinfo.id
where $__timeFilter(date) 
  AND (cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp1
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp2
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp3
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp4)
  AND (ref_type = "reprocessing_tax")
GROUP BY 1, 3
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  year(date) as "Year",
  month(date) as "Month",
  sum(amount) as "Total Monthly Income",
  (sum(amount) - LAG (sum(amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(date) asc, month(date) asc)) AS "Amount Difference From Previous",
  (sum(amount) - LAG (sum(amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(date) asc, month(date) asc))/ LAG (sum(amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(date) asc, month(date) ASC) * 100 AS "% Difference From Previous"
FROM 
  corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry cw
join corptools_corporationwalletdivision cwd on cw.division_id = cwd.id
join corptools_corporationaudit caudit on cwd.corporation_id = caudit.id
join eveonline_evecorporationinfo cinfo on caudit.corporation_id = cinfo.id
where $__timeFilter(date)
  AND (cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp1
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp2
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp3
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp4)
  AND (ref_type = "reprocessing_tax")
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1 DESC, 2 DESC

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(date,'24h') as "time",
  sum(amount) as "Daily Ratting Income"
FROM 
  corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry cw
join corptools_corporationwalletdivision cwd on cw.division_id = cwd.id
join corptools_corporationaudit caudit on cwd.corporation_id = caudit.id
join eveonline_evecorporationinfo cinfo on caudit.corporation_id = cinfo.id
where $__timeFilter(date) 
  AND (cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp1
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp2
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp3
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp4)
  AND (ref_type = "bounty_prizes" OR ref_type = "ess_escrow_transfer")
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  year(date) as "Year",
  month(date) as "Month",
  sum(amount) as "Total Monthly Income",
  (sum(amount) - LAG (sum(amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(date) asc, month(date) asc)) AS "Amount Difference From Previous",
  (sum(amount) - LAG (sum(amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(date) asc, month(date) asc))/ LAG (sum(amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(date) asc, month(date) ASC) * 100 AS "% Difference From Previous"
FROM 
  corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry cw
join corptools_corporationwalletdivision cwd on cw.division_id = cwd.id
join corptools_corporationaudit caudit on cwd.corporation_id = caudit.id
join eveonline_evecorporationinfo cinfo on caudit.corporation_id = cinfo.id
where $__timeFilter(date)
  AND (cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp1
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp2
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp3
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp4)
  AND (ref_type = "ess_escrow_transfer"
  OR ref_type = "bounty_prizes")
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1 DESC, 2 DESC

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(date,'24h') as time_sec,
  sum(amount) / 2 as total,
  ref_type as metric
FROM 
  corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry cw
join corptools_corporationwalletdivision cwd on cw.division_id = cwd.id
join corptools_corporationaudit caudit on cwd.corporation_id = caudit.id
join eveonline_evecorporationinfo cinfo on caudit.corporation_id = cinfo.id
where $__timeFilter(date) 
  AND (cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp1
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp2
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp3
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp4)
  AND (ref_type = "brokers_fee")
GROUP BY 1, 3
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  year(date) as "Year",
  month(date) as "Month",
  sum(amount) as "Total Monthly Income",
  (sum(amount) - LAG (sum(amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(date) asc, month(date) asc)) AS "Amount Difference From Previous",
  (sum(amount) - LAG (sum(amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(date) asc, month(date) asc))/ LAG (sum(amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(date) asc, month(date) ASC) * 100 AS "% Difference From Previous"
FROM 
  corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry cw
join corptools_corporationwalletdivision cwd on cw.division_id = cwd.id
join corptools_corporationaudit caudit on cwd.corporation_id = caudit.id
join eveonline_evecorporationinfo cinfo on caudit.corporation_id = cinfo.id
where $__timeFilter(date)
  AND (cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp1
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp2
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp3
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp4)
  AND (ref_type = "brokers_fee" OR ref_type = "market_provider_tax")
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1 DESC, 2 DESC

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(date,'24h') as "time",
  sum(amount) as "Total Isk",
  sum(amount)/count(ref_type) as "Average Isk per Jump",
  sum(amount)/500 as "LO Burnt",
  count(ref_type) as "Jumps",
  (sum(amount)/500)/count(ref_type) as "Average LO per Jump"
FROM 
  corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND ref_type = "structure_gate_jump"
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  Year(date) as "Year",
  Month(date) as "Month",
  sum(amount) as "Income",
  (sum(amount) - LAG (sum(amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(date) asc, month(date) asc)) AS "Income Diff.",
  (sum(amount) - LAG (sum(amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(date) asc, month(date) asc))/ LAG (sum(amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(date) asc, month(date) ASC) * 100 AS "Income % Diff.",
  count(ref_type) as "Jumps",
  ceil(sum(amount)/750) as "LO Burnt"
FROM 
  corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry
WHERE $__timeFilter(date) and ref_type = "structure_gate_jump"
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 1 DESC, 2 DESC

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(date,'24h') as time_sec,
  sum(amount),
  ref_type as metric
FROM 
  corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry cw
join corptools_corporationwalletdivision cwd on cw.division_id = cwd.id
join corptools_corporationaudit caudit on cwd.corporation_id = caudit.id
join eveonline_evecorporationinfo cinfo on caudit.corporation_id = cinfo.id
where $__timeFilter(date) 
  AND (cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp1
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp2
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp3
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp4)
  AND (ref_type = "industry_job_tax")
GROUP BY 1, 3
ORDER BY 1

  (sum(amount) - LAG (sum(amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(date) asc, month(date) asc)) AS "Amount Difference From Previous",
  (sum(amount) - LAG (sum(amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(date) asc, month(date) asc))/ LAG (sum(amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(date) asc, month(date) ASC) * 100 AS "% Difference From Previous"
FROM 
  corptools_corporationwalletjournalentry cw
join corptools_corporationwalletdivision cwd on cw.division_id = cwd.id
join corptools_corporationaudit caudit on cwd.corporation_id = caudit.id

  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp3
  OR cinfo.corporation_id = $Corp4)

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(date,'1d') as time_sec,
  sum(amount),
  ref_type as metric
FROM

join corptools_corporationwalletdivision cwd on cw.division_id = cwd.id

SELECT
  year(date) as "Year",
  month(date) as "Month",
  sum(amount) as "Total Monthly Income",
  (sum(amount) - LAG (sum(amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(date) asc, month(date) asc)) AS "Amount Difference From Previous",

SELECT
  ss.name as "Name",
  SUM(si.quantity) as "LO Left"
FROM structures_structureitem si
  INNER JOIN structures_structure ss ON si.structure_id = ss.id
WHERE si.location_flag = "StructureFuel"
  AND ss.owner_id = 1
  AND si.eve_type_id = 16273
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 ASC

SELECT
  year(post_time) as "Year",
  month(post_time) as "Month",
  sum(payout_amount) AS "SRP",
  (sum(payout_amount) - LAG (sum(payout_amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(post_time) asc, month(post_time) asc)) AS "Amount Difference From Previous",
  (sum(payout_amount) - LAG (sum(payout_amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(post_time) asc, month(post_time) asc))/ LAG (sum(payout_amount)) OVER (ORDER BY year(post_time) asc, month(post_time) ASC) * 100 AS "% Difference From Previous"
FROM aasrp_aasrprequest
WHERE $__timeFilter(post_time)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1 DESC, 2 DESC

SELECT
  ss.name as "Name",
  SUM(si.quantity) as "Fuel Left",
  SUM(si.quantity / ((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(ss.fuel_expires_at) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP()) / 86400)) as "Fuel Per Day",
  SUM(si.quantity) / SUM(si.quantity / ((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(ss.fuel_expires_at) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP()) / 86400)) as "Days of Fuel Left",
  ss.fuel_expires_at as "Expiration",
  36 / (SUM(si.quantity) / SUM(si.quantity / ((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(ss.fuel_expires_at) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP()) / 86400))) * (SUM(si.quantity / ((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(ss.fuel_expires_at) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP()) / 86400))) + 1296 as "Fuel needed to be 36 days"
FROM structures_structureitem si
  INNER JOIN structures_structure ss ON si.structure_id = ss.id
WHERE si.location_flag = "StructureFuel"
  AND ss.owner_id = 1
  AND si.eve_type_id != 16273
GROUP BY 5, 1
ORDER BY 5 ASC
